metadata.title: CVE-2020-1916 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An incorrect size calculation in ldap_escape may lead to an integeroverflow when overly long input is passed in, resulting in an out-of-boundswrite. This issue affects HHVM prior to 4.56.2, all versions between 4.57.0and 4.78.0, 4.79.0, 4.80.0, 4.81.0, 4.82.0, 4.83.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
